Reviews.Title: Straight Talk
Reviews.Author: Maygan H Beckles
Reviews.Content: This is my very first iphone and I must say that so far I am very happy with this purchase.  I like having a prepaid cell phone with no contact.  It was a nice way to get an iphone without paying the expensive cost.  The phone is working great.  I'm learning how to use it as I go.  I was able to transfer my current number with Straight Talk and I'm up and running.

Reviews.Title: 4s 16GB
Reviews.Author: Amy Lewis
Reviews.Content: The product was used and in excellent condition.  I also liked GB and price.  It came with a little booklet as well as the part that connects to wall charger and computer.  I did not like that I had to purchase the wall plug in.

Reviews.Title: Straight talk Phone
Reviews.Author: LINDA WINKLE
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the phone. Little disappointed with arrival since I paid extra for expedited shipping for my Grandson's Christmas

Reviews.Title: Bummed :(
Reviews.Author: daphne harmon
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 iphones that were the same ones been great the other stays locked up frozen or starting over reloading iOS because wont allow me to back up force me to install iOS 7.1 or stay in restart bootloop wouldn't allow me to load my back up or install any other firmware  ...bummed :(
